detail_desc: Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Jersey cap in a cotton blend with an inner terry sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Lightly padded popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a quilted lower section. Hood with a high collar and a zip with a chin guard at the top. Front pocket with a concealed zip and a kangaroo pocket. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a zip at one side of the hem. Elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Two high slits at the front, one with a decorative print. Soft brushed inside.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, hole-patterned, functional fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless.

Running trousers in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Side pockets with a taped zip, concealed back pockets, elasticated hems and reflective details. Regular fit.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves, a mesh yoke at the top and a rounded hem.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a collar and drawstring, taped zip down the front, side pockets with taped zips and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long raglan sleeves and jacquard-knit details. Seamless.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a lined, padded hood and practical two-way zip down the front that can open from both directions for easy access. Extra-long sleeves with an inset section in stretch fabric underneath for greater movement and cuffs with thumbholes to help you stay warm outside. Front pockets with a concealed zip for safe storage of valuables. Rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back for a better fit when moving. Lined.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Reflective detail on the sleeves, thumbholes at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric in a relaxed fit with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets, and close-fitting ribbed hems with a zip.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.

Studio Collection. 70s-inspired, 5-pocket jeans in unwashed cotton denim. Fitted at the top with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, extra-long legs with creases and wide hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. The jeans are manufactured using a more sustainable process with minimal amounts of water used in the dyeing process and zero water wastage as it is reused. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould ‒ an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
